text:
TAL SCULLY: My advice to women
in physics is to not be scared
and to be confident in yourself.

It's very easy to be
intimidated by men

who seem to know everything
that they're doing.

Because nobody knows what
they're doing in life.

And once you realize
this, if you just

put on an outward
face of confidence,

I find that helps to
realize that there's

no difference
between being a woman

and a man besides how some
people might treat you.
